definition: to guard against/to exhort/to admonish or warn/to give up or stop doing sth/Buddhist monastic discipline/ring (for a finger)
strip/item/article/clause (of law or treaty)/classifier for long thin things (ribbon, river, road, trousers etc)

sentences.english: They rarely push the government's limits.
sentences.chinese: 他們很少觸及政府的戒條。

sentences.english: This is the great and first commandment.
sentences.chinese: 這是最偉大和最首要的戒條。

sentences.english: As guidelines for virtue and ethical behavior, the Buddha formulated precepts for us to follow.
sentences.chinese: 佛陀制定了戒條作爲我們道德行爲的指導方針。
